CN: 抽 2 张牌，将 1 张「症状：呓语」加入弃牌堆中。无法出售。
EN: Draw 2 cards and add 1 "Somniloquy" to the Discard Pile. Cannot be sold.

CN: 获得 1 点算力，将 1 张「症状：癔想」加入弃牌堆中。无法出售。
EN: Gain 1 Arithmetica, adds 1 "Hysteria" to the Discard Pile. Cannot be sold.

CN: 战斗结束后，额外获得 100 黑印，但得到一张症状卡。
EN: After the battle, acquire an extra 100 Black Sigils, but develop a random Symptom.

CN: 战斗结束后，额外获得 100 黑印，但得到一张症状卡。
EN: After the battle, acquire an extra 100 Black Sigils, but develop a random Symptom.

CN: 战斗结束后，额外获得 50 黑印和 1 张症状卡。
EN: After the battle, acquire an extra 50 Black Sigils, but develop a random Symptom.

CN: 战斗结束后，额外获得 50 黑印和 1 张症状卡。
EN: After the battle, acquire an extra 50 Black Sigils, but develop a random Symptom.

CN: 战斗结束后，额外获得 100 黑印和 2 张症状卡。
EN: After the battle, acquire an extra 100 Black Sigils, but develop 2 random Symptoms.

CN: 造物上限+5, [融痕]中刷新次数+1。战斗结束后，获得 125 黑印，拾取时可以选择最多 6 张症状卡删除。
EN: Relic Capacity +5, +1 refresh in [D-Mark]. After battle, acquire 125 Black Sigils. When picked up, you can choose to destroy up to 6 Symptom cards.

CN: 每当获得症状卡后，使最大生命提高 [Arg1] 点。
EN: Whenever you develop a Symptom, increase Max HP by [Arg1].

CN: 休息处额外提供一个选项：消除至多 3 张症状，获得 <WeaponEffect_Num:[StateArg1]> 点黑印。在星辰篇中，效果改为「使装备者的维度影像造物出现的可能性提高 100％」。
EN: Rest Areas provide an additional option: Destroy up to 3 Symptom cards, acquire <WeaponEffect_Num:[StateArg1]> Black Sigils. In "Astral Reign", this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimension Image Relic to appear".

CN: 休息处额外提供一个选项：消除至多 3 张症状，获得 <WeaponEffect_Num:[StateArg1]> 点黑印。在星辰篇中，效果改为「使装备者的维度影像造物出现的可能性提高 100％」。
EN: Rest Areas provide an additional option: Destroy up to 3 Symptom cards, acquire <WeaponEffect_Num:[StateArg1]> Black Sigils. In "Astral Reign", this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimension Image Relic to appear".

CN: 降低所有敌人 [Arg2] 点临时力量，将一张<DerivativeCardKeywords_28:症状：「崩溃」>置入手牌。“很痛吗？真可怜……哭出来就好啦！”
EN: Reduce all enemies' [Arg2] Temporary STR and place a <DerivativeCardKeywords_28:"Trauma"> into hand. "Does it hurt? So pitiful... Just cry it out!"
